body: This PR moves Python 2.6 unit tests from Travis to Github Actions. To do so an ad-hoc container image based on CentOS 6 has been created. The image `Dockerfile` is maintained in a [new repository](https://github.com/spack/spack-ci-containers)  of the Spack organization and the image is built and [hosted on Dockerhub](https://hub.docker.com/repository/docker/alalazo/github-actions).
title: Move Python 2.6 unit tests to Github Actions
